Verses: 1 isravele, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Thirumbu; Nee Un Akkiramaththinaal Vizhundhaai.

2 vaarththaigalaikkondu Karththaridaththil Thirumbungal; Avarai Nokki: Dhevareer Ellaa Akkiramaththaiyum Neekki, Engalai Dhayavaai Angeegariththarulum; Appozhudhu Naangal Engal Udhadugalin Kaalaigalai Seluththuvom.

3 aseeriyaa Engalai Ratchippadhillai; Naangal Kudhiraigalinmel Eramaattom; Engal Kaigalin Kiriyaiyaippaarththu: Neengal Engal Dhevargalendru Ini Sollamaattom; Thikkatravan Ummidaththil Irakkamperugiraan Endru Sollungal.
4 naan Avargal Seerkettai Gunamaakkuven; Avargalai Manappoorvamaai Snegippen; En Kobam Avargalaivittu Neengitru.
5 naan Isravelukkup Paniyaippoliruppen; Avan Leelip Pushpaththaippol Malaruvaan; Leebanonaippol Veroondri Nirpaan.
6 avan Kilaigal Ongip Padarum, Avan Alangaaram Olivamaraththinudaiya Alangaaraththaippolavum, Avanudaiya Vaasanai Leebanonudaiya Vaasanaiyaippolavum Irukkum.

7 avan Nizhalil Kudiyirukkiravargal Thirumbuvaargal; Dhaaniya Vilaichchalaippola Sezhiththu, Dhraatchachchedigalaippolap Padaruvaargal; Avan Vaasanai Leebanonudaiya Dhraatcharasaththin Vaasanaiyaippola Irukkum.

8 ini Enakkum Vikkiragangalukkum Enna Endru Eppiraayeem Solluvaan; Naan Avanukku Sevikoduththu, Avanmel Nokkamaayirundhen; Naan Pachchaiyaana Dhevadhaaru Virutchampolirukkiren; Ennaale Un Kaniyundaayitru Endru Eppiraayeem Solluvaan.

9 ivaigalai Unaraththakka Gnaanamullavan Yaar? Ivaigalai Gragikkaththakka Buththiyullavan Yaar? Karththarudaiya Vazhigal Semmaiyaanavaigal, Needhimaangal Avaigalil Nadappaargal; Paadhagarovendraal Avaigalil Idarivizhuvaargal.
